meanings.definition: Not reacting or responding to stimuli.
meanings.sent1: The patient's unresponsiveness to the loud noises concerned the doctor.
meanings.sent2: Her unresponsiveness during the meeting made it difficult to collaborate.
meanings.sent3: The cat's unresponsiveness to the laser pointer was both amusing and frustrating.
meanings.sent4: The unresponsiveness of the old computer felt like trying to communicate with a brick wall.
meanings.sent5: The unresponsiveness of the security guard left the building vulnerable to intruders.

meanings.sent1: The teacher was puzzled by the student's unresponsiveness to the question.
meanings.sent2: The unresponsiveness of the audience made the comedian's jokes fall flat.
meanings.sent3: The unresponsiveness of the vending machine when I inserted the coin was comically frustrating.
meanings.sent4: The unresponsiveness of the government to the citizens' pleas for help was disheartening.
meanings.sent5: The unresponsiveness of the phone company to customer complaints led to many frustrated customers.
